The '''Wyoming Department of Corrections''' ('''WDOC''') is a state agency of Wyoming that operates adult correctional facilities. It is headquartered in Suite 100 of the 1934 Wyott Drive building in [[Cheyenne, Wyoming|Cheyenne]].ref"[http://doc.state.wy.us/doc/contact.html Contact Us]". Wyoming Department of Corrections. Retrieved on August 22, 2010.</ref>
==History== In November 1990 Wyoming voters approved a constitutional amendment that abolished the [[Wyoming State Board of Charities and Reform]]. The institutions of the former state agency were divided and given to other agencies; the Department of Corrections, created in 1991, took responsibility of the adult correctional facilities and also absorbed the adult parole functions of the [[Wyoming Department of Probation and Parole]].ref"[http://doc.state.wy.us/about/index.html About the Department of Corrections]". Wyoming Department of Corrections. Retrieved on August 22, 2010.</ref>
==Facilities== Institutions include:ref"[http://doc.state.wy.us/doc/contactinstitutions.html Contact Institutions]". Wyoming Department of Corrections. Retrieved on August 22, 2010.</ref>
* [[Wyoming State Penitentiary]] ([[Rawlins, Wyoming|Rawlins]]) * Wyoming Women's Center ([[Lusk, Wyoming|Lusk]]; inmate capacity 261) * Wyoming Honor Farm ([[Riverton, Wyoming|Riverton]]; inmate capacity 283) * Wyoming Honor Conservation Camp & Boot Camp ([[Newcastle, Wyoming|Newcastle]]; combined inmate capacity 261)ref"[http://factfinder.census.gov/servlet/MapItDrawServlet?geo_id=16000US5656215&_bucket_id=50&tree_id=420&context=saff&_lang=en&_sse=on Newcastle city, Wyoming]". [[U.S. Census Bureau]]. Retrieved on December 12, 2010.</ref> * [[Wyoming Medium Correctional Institution]] ([[Torrington, Wyoming|Torrington]])ref"[http://goshencounty.org/file.asp?id=9 Wyoming Medium Correctional Institution (WMCI)]". Goshen County GIS Department. 2009. Retrieved on December 12, 2010.</ref> ** The grand opening and ribbon cutting occurred on January 6, 2010. It serves as an intake center for men who are not sentenced to death.ref"[http://doc.state.wy.us/institutions/wmci/index.html Wyoming Medium Correctional Institution]". Wyoming Department of Corrections. Retrieved on August 22, 2010.</ref>
==Fallen officers== Since the establishment of the Wyoming Department of Corrections, two officers have died in the line of duty.ref[http://www.odmp.org/agency/4322-wyoming-department-of-corrections-wyoming The Officer Down Memorial Page]</ref>
